source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000010_KRILE<tab>Erenville!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000010_KRILE<tab>Ah, Erenville<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000020_ERENVILLE<tab>Apologies for the wait. I hope I haven't called you away from anything important.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000020_ERENVILLE<tab>Désolé, finalement c'est moi qui vous ai fait attendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000030_ERENVILLE<tab>I chanced upon some commissioned items at my destination, so I thought I might deliver them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000030_ERENVILLE<tab>Je suis allé honorer une commande, puisque j'ai par chance trouvé là-bas ce qu'il fallait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000040_GRAHATIA<tab>Where did you go, if I may ask?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000040_GRAHATIA<tab>Là-bas<var 1D /var>? C'est-à-dirrre...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000050_ERENVILLE<tab>The New World─Tural.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000050_ERENVILLE<tab>Sur le continent de Tural. Ici, on l'appelle encore le “nouveau monde”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000060_KRILE<tab>You went to Tural!? Then the person who you wished to introduce...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000060_KRILE<tab>Par les Douze<var 1D /var>! Tu as voyagé jusqu'au nouveau monde<var 1D /var>!? Mais alors, cette personne que tu voulais nous présenter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000070_ERENVILLE<tab>Aye, she hails from there. I present to you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000070_ERENVILLE<tab>Oui, nous avons fait le trajet de retour ensemble, voici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000080_GRAHATIA<tab>...It seems you've lost her.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000080_GRAHATIA<tab>Elle n'a pas l'airrr d'être là...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000090_KRILE<tab>Did she wander off?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000090_KRILE<tab>Elle s'est peut-être perdue en chemin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000100_ERENVILLE<tab>[SIGH] (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000100_ERENVILLE<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000110_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Exuberant Newcomer-)Sorry, sorry! It's just so different here─I can't help but want to explore!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000110_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Jeune femme énergique-)J'arrive, désolée<var 1D /var>! Tout est tellement nouveau, j'ai pas pu m'empêcher de flâner un peu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000120_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, while you were exploring, your candidate came to us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000120_ERENVILLE<tab>Franchement... Tu crois vraiment que c'est le moment de faire du tourisme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000130_ERENVILLE<tab>This is <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>. The adventurer you crossed the seas to meet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000130_ERENVILLE<tab>Voilà, c'est <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var>, l'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> dont je t'ai parlé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000140_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Exuberant Newcomer-)Ooh... You weren't exaggerating. It's plain <var 08 E905 ((she's)) ((he's)) /var> no ordinary <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000140_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Jeune femme énergique-)Mm mmh, je vois... T'avais raison, ça a pas l'air d'être n'importe qui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000150_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'm Wuk Lamat. Claimant to the throne of Tuliyollal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000150_WUKLAMAT<tab>Enchantée, moi c'est Wuk Lamat<var 1D /var>! Princesse du royaume fédéré du Tuliyollal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000160_KRILE<tab>Tuliyollal...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000160_KRILE<tab>Tuliyollal...<var 1D /var>? J'ai déjà vu ce nom quelque part...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000170_ERENVILLE<tab>It's Tural's governing nation. The capital bears the same name.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000170_ERENVILLE<tab>Il s'agit du royaume qui dirige le continent de Tural, ainsi que du nom de sa capitale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000180_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'll get to the point. I want you to come with me to my homeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000180_WUKLAMAT<tab>Je vais aller droit au but<var 1D /var>: viens avec moi à Tuliyollal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000190_ERENVILLE<tab>Given the magnitude of the request, perhaps you should explain why you're making it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000190_ERENVILLE<tab>C'est pas une façon de demander, ça... Prends le temps de lui expliquer, au moins<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hahaha! Of course, of course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ha ha ha, c'est pas faux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Soon an event of great import will be held in Tural: the rite of succession.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bon, pour faire court, un grand événement va avoir lieu dans mon pays.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000220_WUKLAMAT<tab>Taking the form of a contest, it will determine who next ascends the throne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000220_WUKLAMAT<tab>Il s'agit du “rite de succession”... Une épreuve qui détermine le futur souverain du royaume.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000230_WUKLAMAT<tab>As daughter to its present keeper, I will participate─and I have every intention of winning.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000230_WUKLAMAT<tab>En tant que princesse, il est normal que j'y participe. Et je compte bien remporter la victoire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000240_WUKLAMAT<tab>I was searching for champions to join me when Erenville told me about you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Pour ça, j'ai besoin d'un partenaire costaud. Voilà pourquoi Erenville m'a parlé de toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000250_WUKLAMAT<tab>A mighty warrior who knows no fear! Who sweeps aside terrible fiends as if they were reeds! Who flew to the edge of existence and saved our star!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000250_WUKLAMAT<tab>Et honnêtement, j'aurais pas pu trouver mieux que <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> qui a terrassé des créatures cauchemardesques par centaines et qu'a pas hésité à partir jusqu'aux confins de l'univers pour sauver le monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000260_ERENVILLE<tab>She asked who Eorzea's greatest hero was, and so I told her. Much more elegantly, I might add.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000260_ERENVILLE<tab>Désolé, elle voulait absolument savoir qui était <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> plus balèze de tout Éorzéa... Il a bien fallu que je lui raconte tes hauts faits.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Now you know why. You'll come to Tural, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bon, maintenant que tu sais tout, viens avec moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000280_GRAHATIA<tab>Wait! Let's all just...slow down.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000280_GRAHATIA<tab>Euh, temps morrrt<var 1D /var>! Temps morrrt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000290_GRAHATIA<tab>Wuk Lamat, was it? You claim to be of the royal family, but is it not the Mamool Ja who rule in Tural?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000290_GRAHATIA<tab>Wuk Lamat, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Tu dis êtrrre la princesse du Tuliyollal, mais je croyais que ce pays était gouverné par les Mamool Ja<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000300_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tuliyollal is a nation of many peoples. Not only the Mamool Ja as some across the seas are quick to assume.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000300_WUKLAMAT<tab>C'est vrai que vous appelez notre continent les “terres barbares mamool ja” par chez vous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000310_WUKLAMAT<tab>That said, its present ruler is a Mamool Ja, and one blessed with two heads besides.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000310_WUKLAMAT<tab>T'as raison, c'est bien un d'entre eux qui règne sur le Tuliyollal. On le surnomme “Double-tête”, et c'est pas juste un titre. Il en a vraiment deux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000320_WUKLAMAT<tab>He's also my father. Not by blood, obviously, but he raised me as his own, and that's what matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000320_WUKLAMAT<tab>Nous ne sommes peut-être pas liés par le sang, mais c'est lui qui m'a élevée et éduquée. Alors je le considère comme mon vrai père, quoi qu'on en dise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000330_GRAHATIA<tab>So that is the way of it... My apologies if I was indelicate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000330_GRAHATIA<tab>D'accord, je comprends mieux... Excuse-moi, c'était malvenu de ma parrrt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000340_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hardly! I know little about your land, and nothing about your parentage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000340_WUKLAMAT<tab>T'en fais pas, va<var 1D /var>! Moi aussi, y a plein de choses que je sais pas sur vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000350_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah, but in my eagerness I've gotten ahead of myself. I can't expect you to agree on the spot when we've only just met.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000350_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah, mais c'est vrai<var 1D /var>! Je peux pas te demander de me suivre alors qu'on se connaît à peine...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000360_WUKLAMAT<tab>If you have any questions, I'll do my best to answer them. Just know, though, that if it's adventure you seek, you could do far worse than come with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000360_WUKLAMAT<tab>Promis, je répondrai à toutes tes questions plus tard. Mais je peux au moins t'assurer une chose<var 1D /var>: si t'es <var 08 E905 ((une vraie aventurière)) ((un vrai aventurier)) /var>, aucune chance que tu refuses mon offre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000370_WUKLAMAT<tab>Now, this is only a rumor...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000370_WUKLAMAT<tab>C'est que des rumeurs, mais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000380_WUKLAMAT<tab>But apparently, the contest will involve the fabled city of gold and the legendary beast Valigarmanda.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000380_WUKLAMAT<tab>Il paraît que cette fois, le rituel impliquera la mystérieuse cité d'or, et peut-être même Valigarmanda, la plus puissante créature de Tural.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000390_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tell me that doesn't pique your interest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000390_WUKLAMAT<tab>Alors, pas mauvais comme plan, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You have my complete attention.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Typiquement le genre d'histoire que j'aime<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is strictly a rumor, nothing more?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Oui, mais c'est juste une rumeur, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Golden city... I've heard about it before.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Des cités d'or<var 1D /var>? Où est-ce que j'ai entendu ça...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000400_WUKLAMAT<tab>We're going to get along, you and I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000400_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ha ha ha<var 1D /var>! Je vois qu'on va bien s'entendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000410_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tural has no shortage of unexplored frontiers and deadly fiends. You'll never want for excitement, I promise you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000410_WUKLAMAT<tab>De toute façon, une fois au Tural, t'auras ton lot de terres inconnues à explorer et de bêtes féroces à combattre. Crois-moi, tu risques pas de t'ennuyer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000420_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, the details of the contest have yet to be announced.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000420_WUKLAMAT<tab>Pour le moment, oui. Les détails du rituel n'ont pas encore été annoncés of<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ciel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000430_WUKLAMAT<tab>But the rumors come from someone involved in the preparations, so I'd say there's more than a grain of truth to them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000430_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mais je tiens ça d'un des organisateurs de la cérémonie. Question fiabilité, l'info me paraît solide.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000440_WUKLAMAT<tab>So the tales have reached even these shores! I can't help but feel proud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah bah ça, je m'y attendais pas<var 1D /var>! Qui aurait cru que cette légende était connue par-delà l'océan<var 1D /var>? Par contre, je n'ai jamais entendu dire qu'il y en avait plusieurs...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000450_ERENVILLE<tab>I advise you not to put much store by these rumors. Golden cities are naught but a dreamer's fancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000450_ERENVILLE<tab>Pas la peine de s'emballer pour de simples rumeurs. La cité d'or n'a jamais été qu'un conte pour enfants, de toute façon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000460_WUKLAMAT<tab>Says the dreamer who was bent on finding one when he was a child. Just because you failed doesn't mean it doesn't exist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000460_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ben voyons<var 1D /var>! Et c'est toi qui dis ça, alors que t'as passé ton temps à la chercher quand t'étais môme<var 1D /var>? Tu l'as peut-être pas trouvée, mais c'est pas une raison pour jouer les rabat-joie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000470_KRILE<tab>Tuliyollal and the golden city... Just like in the letter to Grandfather.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000470_KRILE<tab>Ça alors... Le royaume fédéré du Tuliyollal... Et maintenant, la cité d'or de Tural... Exactement ce que mentionnait la lettre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000480_WUKLAMAT<tab>Regardless of what the contest may entail, it'll be no simple thing. If I'm to triumph, I'll need capable and dependable companions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000480_WUKLAMAT<tab>Cité d'or ou non, l'épreuve pour désigner le futur souverain sera pas une mince affaire. C'est pour ça que j'ai besoin d'un partenaire capable d'assurer mes arrières.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000490_WUKLAMAT<tab>So let's go on a hunt together! There's no better way to get acquainted!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000490_WUKLAMAT<tab>Du coup, ça te dirait qu'on s'organise une petite chasse<var 1D /var>? Y a rien de mieux pour apprendre à se connaître<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000500_ERENVILLE<tab>From here, we must walk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000500_ERENVILLE<tab>À partir d'ici, on va devoir se débrouiller à pied.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000510_WUKLAMAT<tab>So much ice... It rivals even Yok Tural.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000510_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sacrée banquise<var 1D /var>! À part celle de Yok Tural, j'en connais pas d'aussi grande<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ooh, a white bear! I wonder what it tastes like...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Eh, regardez, y a un ours tout blanc<var 1D /var>! Ça doit être trop bon en grillade<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000530_ERENVILLE<tab>Remember, we're here to deal with creatures that have been deemed an unacceptable danger. Do not attack anything else unprovoked.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000530_ERENVILLE<tab>On est là pour éradiquer les créatures hostiles, tu te souviens<var 1D /var>? Évite d'enquiquiner les pauvres bêtes qui n'ont rien demandé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000540_WUKLAMAT<tab>I know, I know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000540_WUKLAMAT<tab>Je sais, je sais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000550_WUKLAMAT<tab>So this is the isle where aether literally bursts forth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000550_WUKLAMAT<tab>Voilà donc notre fameuse île où l'éther coule à flots.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000560_ERENVILLE<tab>Aye, the Isle of Haam. The geysers lie deep inland, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000560_ERENVILLE<tab>Exact. C'est l'île de Haam que tu as devant toi. Et pour être plus précis, les geysers d'éther doivent se trouver tout au fond de celle-ci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000570_WUKLAMAT<tab>You really are knowledgeable. Koana told me nothing about this place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000570_WUKLAMAT<tab>T'es un vrai puits de savoir, ma parole<var 1D /var>! Même Koana m'a jamais parlé d'un tel endroit. Et pourtant, il en a vu, des choses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000580_ERENVILLE<tab>I doubt your brother managed to come out this way. He's like to have toured facilities like Labyrinthos, however.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000580_ERENVILLE<tab>Ça n'a rien d'étonnant. Il n'avait aucune raison de s'aventurer jusqu'ici, quand bien même il aurait eu l'occasion de visiter le Labyrinthos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000590_WUKLAMAT<tab>The great big cavern under the city? It's amazing that they could make a sky down there, complete with a sun.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000590_WUKLAMAT<tab>Le Labyrinthos, c'est ce grand trou avec un faux ciel dans les sous-sols de Sharlayan, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? C'est fou que des humains aient pu construire un coin pareil<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000600_GRAHATIA<tab>This brother of yours... He has been to Sharlayan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000600_GRAHATIA<tab>Qui est ce “Koana” dont tu parrrles<var 1D /var>? Si je comprends bien, il est déjà venu sur notre continent<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000610_WUKLAMAT<tab>He has. Koana's my second older brother, and until recently, he was a student in the city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000610_WUKLAMAT<tab>Koana, c'est mon deuxième frangin. Enfin, là encore, on n'est pas liés par le sang, mais je le considère comme tel. Il était en voyage d'études à Sharlayan jusqu'à tout récemment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000620_WUKLAMAT<tab>He went on and on about “technological amusements.” It made me want to come here too one day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000620_WUKLAMAT<tab>Quand il est revenu chez nous, il racontait à qui voulait l'entendre les merveilles technologiques qu'il avait vues. C'est ce qui m'a donné envie de venir, moi aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000630_WUKLAMAT<tab>And so I did. I think I understood something of how he felt when I set foot in his beloved Studium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000630_WUKLAMAT<tab>D'ailleurs, il fréquentait l'institut que j'ai visité tout à l'heure.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000640_GRAHATIA<tab>He went to the Studium? Your brother must be quite a scholar.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000640_GRAHATIA<tab>Il était étudiant à l'académie de magie<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000650_GRAHATIA<tab>But I wonder... Like you, he'd be royalty, yes? Such a personage coming to Sharlayan to receive an education would surely have caused a stir, yet I recall nothing of the sort...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000650_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais si c'est ton frère, il est membre de la famille royale, non<var 1D /var>? Pourtant, la venue d'un prince étranger n'a pas fait grrrand bruit ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000660_WUKLAMAT<tab>He consulted with the head of the Studium beforehand, that his identity might remain secret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000660_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ouais, il a demandé aux grands pontes de l'école de pas révéler son identité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000670_WUKLAMAT<tab>Being Miqo'te, he had no trouble blending in. He's adopted like me, you see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000670_WUKLAMAT<tab>Koana aussi a été adopté, et c'est un Miqo'te, comme toi. Il suffit qu'il dise pas d'où il vient, et les gens y voient que du feu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000680_WUKLAMAT<tab>One time, though, he almost let it slip to a professor. It was all he could do to parry the barrage of questions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000680_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bon, ça lui est arrivé une fois de se trahir, je te raconte pas l'avalanche de questions qu'il a reçue après<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000690_GRAHATIA<tab>Having no shortage of questions myself, I can imagine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000690_GRAHATIA<tab>J'imagine trrrès bien la scène. Je ferais sûrement la même chose si je l'avais en face de moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000700_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ask whatever you like. I don't mind. But I maintain hunting together is the best way to get to know someone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000700_WUKLAMAT<tab>En tout cas, j'espère que cette petite chasse te permettra aussi de mieux me connaître.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000710_ERENVILLE<tab>The researchers should be up ahead. Let's find them and learn what we can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000710_ERENVILLE<tab>Nous devrions rencontrer plus loin des chercheurs qui connaissent la région comme leur poche. Ils pourront sûrement nous renseigner sur la situation là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000720_WUKLAMAT<tab>Powerful wings and razor-sharp talons... Worthy prey!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000720_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmm... Ailes robustes, serres pointues... Tu me plais, toi. Tu seras ma proie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000730_WUKLAMAT<tab>What is that thing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000730_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bon sang, c'est quoi ce truc<var 1D /var>!? Il est énorme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000740_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Squawk! What is that thing!? What is that thing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000740_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>C'EST CÔÔA CE TRRRUC<var 1D /var>? C'EST CÔÔA CE TRRRUC<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000750_WUKLAMAT<tab>It...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000750_WUKLAMAT<tab>Il...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000760_WUKLAMAT<tab>It speaks!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000760_WUKLAMAT<tab>Il parle<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000770_GRAHATIA<tab>It's heading towards the falls!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000770_GRAHATIA<tab>Il est parrrti vers la cascade<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000780_ERENVILLE<tab>I'll stay with the researchers. The creature, I leave to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000780_ERENVILLE<tab>Je reste ici pour mettre les chercheurs en sécurité. Occupez-vous de ce monstre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>Come, Wuk Lamat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000790_GRAHATIA<tab>Wuk Lamat, on y va<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000800_WUKLAMAT<tab>R-Right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000800_WUKLAMAT<tab>(se reprend)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000810_WUKLAMAT<tab>Just so we're clear, I wasn't startled by the beast earlier. It caught me by surprise, that's all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000810_WUKLAMAT<tab>Q-qu'on soit bien d'accord, j'étais pas en train de flipper, compris<var 1D /var>? Il m'a un peu surprise, c'est tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000820_GRAHATIA<tab>Forgive me, but I fail to see a difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000820_GRAHATIA<tab>Ce n'est pas la même chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000830_WUKLAMAT<tab>I-I'm getting hungry. Let's be done with this so we can eat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000830_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bon, c'est pas l'tout mais j'commence à avoir la dalle, moi<var 1D /var>! Allez, grouillons-nous de lui régler son compte, qu'on puisse passer à table<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000840_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Caught me by surprise! Caught me by surprise!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000840_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>PAS EN TRAIN DE FLIPPER, COMPRRRIS<var 1D /var>? PAS EN TRAIN DE FLIPPER, COMPRRRIS<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000850_WUKLAMAT<tab>Think you're clever, huh? I'll rip off that beak and roast you on a spit!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000850_WUKLAMAT<tab>Roooh la ferme, sale piaf<var 1D /var>! Viens par là, que j'te botte le croupion<var 1D /var>! Tu vas finir en rôti<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000860_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph, and I had barely limbered up.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000860_WUKLAMAT<tab>Eh ben<var 1D /var>? C'est déjà fini<var 1D /var>? J'ai à peine eu le temps de m'échauffer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>(sourire en coin)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000880_GRAHATIA<tab>It was a terrible foe, but no match for your axe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000880_GRAHATIA<tab>Ce monstre était plutôt corrriace, mais tu t'en es très bien tirée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000890_WUKLAMAT<tab>O-Only to be expected!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000890_WUKLAMAT<tab>B-bien sûr<var 1D /var>! Pour qui tu me prends<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000900_WUKLAMAT<tab>You were pretty impressive yourselves. I was right to invite you on a hunt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000900_WUKLAMAT<tab>D'ailleurs, vous vous êtes battus comme des chefs, vous aussi<var 1D /var>! Je regrette pas de vous avoir proposé cette chasse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000910_WUKLAMAT<tab>But what a curious bird that was. Though we have similar in Tural, they don't grow so big or use such dirty tricks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000910_WUKLAMAT<tab>N'empêche, j'ai jamais vu un oiseau pareil... En tout cas, pas aussi gros<var 1D /var>! Et puis, c'est une habitude, chez vous, que les piafs se mettent à parler<var 1D /var>? Ils sont énervants, à répéter tout ce qu'on dit...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000920_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>Dirty tricks! Dirty tricks!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000920_GIANTCOLIBRI<tab>ÉNERVANTS, CÔÔA<var 1D /var>! ÉNERVANTS<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000930_WUKLAMAT<tab>Aye, dirty and despicable. Otherwise I could have...easily...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000930_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ouais, exactement comme ça<var 1D /var>! D'ailleurs, j'ai l'impression de l'entendre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000940_KRILE<tab>Leave this to me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000940_KRILE<tab>(-???-)Je me charge de lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000950_KRILE<tab>Have at you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000950_KRILE<tab>Prends ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000960_GRAHATIA<tab>Krile?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000960_GRAHATIA<tab>Krile...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000970_KRILE<tab>I am terribly, terribly sorry to have kept you all waiting!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000970_KRILE<tab>Désolée de vous avoir fait attendre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000980_ERENVILLE<tab>She arrived as I was seeing the researchers to safety. It was all I could do to keep up with her after I explained what happened.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000980_ERENVILLE<tab>Je l'ai vue débarquer à toute vitesse alors que je terminais de mettre les chercheurs à l'abri. Je lui ai donc expliqué la situation avant de la guider jusqu'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000990_GRAHATIA<tab>So this is what you meant by seeing to preparations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_000990_GRAHATIA<tab>Alors c'était pour ça, quand tu parrrlais de te préparer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001000_KRILE<tab>After hearing of the contest, I thought how wonderful it would be to join you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001000_KRILE<tab>Quand notre nouvelle amie a parlé du rite de succession, je me suis dit que c'était l'occasion rêvée de vous accompagner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001010_KRILE<tab>In coming here, I wanted to demonstrate my skill at arms to Wuk Lamat. Alas, it seems I missed most of the action...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001010_KRILE<tab>J'espérais aussi profiter de cette chasse pour lui montrer de quoi j'étais capable, mais on dirait que j'ai trop tardé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001020_WUKLAMAT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001020_WUKLAMAT<tab>(surprise)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001030_WUKLAMAT<tab>That was amazing! The beast didn't stand a chance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001030_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ahem, toi aussi, t'es plutôt balèze, dans ton genre<var 1D /var>! Merci pour le coup de main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001040_KRILE<tab>I'm glad to have been of service.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001040_KRILE<tab>Tant mieux, je suis ravie d'avoir pu me rendre utile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001050_GRAHATIA<tab>May I ask what inspired this change?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001050_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais... Pourrrquoi ce changement soudain<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001060_KRILE<tab>You will recall the time you descended to the aetherial sea in search of Hydaelyn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001060_KRILE<tab>Le jour où vous avez eu recours au Prisme de l'Aitia pour plonger dans la mer des étoiles et rencontrer Hydaelyn, je suis restée en retrait... Tu te souviens<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001070_KRILE<tab>Recognizing that my skills were inadequate, I chose to provide support from afar rather than join you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001070_KRILE<tab>J'ai choisi de vous soutenir autant que possible à distance, car au fond je savais que je n'avais pas la force nécessaire pour vous accompagner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001080_KRILE<tab>It was the same when you set forth for Ultima Thule. How it pained me to stay behind, again and again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001080_KRILE<tab>La même chose s'est produite lorsque vous êtes partis aux confins de l'univers. J'aurais tellement voulu vous suivre... Mais je n'aurais été qu'un fardeau pour vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001090_KRILE<tab>That's what inspired this change. Ever since the Final Days were averted, I've used every spare moment to hone my craft.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001090_KRILE<tab>Alors quand nous avons enfin pu mettre toute cette histoire d'apocalypse derrière nous, je me suis dit qu'il était temps de reprendre mon en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001100_KRILE<tab>As you all have adapted your methods to suit the circumstances, I started by considering how I might best contribute.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001100_KRILE<tab>Après tout, des combattants émérites comme Thancred ou Alisaie ont su remanier leur style de combat pour faire face à de nouvelles situations... Je me suis dit que je pouvais commencer par là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001110_KRILE<tab>And after much deliberation, I arrived at my answer...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001110_KRILE<tab>Et la voie que j'ai trouvée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001120_KRILE<tab>With the esoteric art passed down by the legendary Archon Relm─pictomancy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001120_KRILE<tab>C'est celle de la pictomancie, un ancien art magique hérité de Relm, l'une des douze Preux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001130_KRILE<tab>As I recall, you have embraced versatility to effectively complement a certain someone's style.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001130_KRILE<tab>Toi aussi, Raha, tu fais en sorte d'adapter ton style de combat à chaque situation, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Ainsi, tu es toujours prêt à t'engager dans n'importe quelle aventure.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001140_KRILE<tab>What I do is much the same. Like you, I don't want to be left behind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001140_KRILE<tab>Eh bien, considérez que c'est pareil pour moi. Dorénavant, il n'est plus question que je reste sur la touche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001150_GRAHATIA<tab>... Tu as tout comprrris.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>I must say, you appear to be especially keen on being involved in the ritual of succession. Is there any particular reason?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001160_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais en dehors de ça, aurais-tu une raison particulièrrre de vouloir participer au rite<var 1D /var>? Ce n'est pas comme si le monde était en danger, cette fois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001170_KRILE<tab>Yes, there is. This letter from Tuliyollal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001170_KRILE<tab>Justement, à ce sujet, j'aimerais te montrer quelque chose, Wuk Lamat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001180_KRILE<tab>It was addressed to my grandfather Galuf, and turned up among the Students' archives.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001180_KRILE<tab>Cette lettre était conservée dans les archives des Élèves de Baldesion. Elle est adressée au fondateur de l'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion. Autrement dit, mon grand-père.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001190_KRILE<tab>The ink was faded so I couldn't fully make out the sender's name, a Gulool...someone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001190_KRILE<tab>En revanche, je ne suis pas parvenue à reconnaître le nom de l'expéditeur, dont la dernière partie est effacée... Tout ce que je peux lire, c'est<var 1D /var>: “Gulool...”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ja Ja. Gulool Ja Ja. That's my father, the Dawnservant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001200_WUKLAMAT<tab>Gulool Ja Ja... C'est mon paternel. Le roi du Tuliyollal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001210_WUKLAMAT<tab>What does the letter say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Et... elle raconte quoi, cette lettre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001220_KRILE<tab>While much of it isn't legible, it appears to be a request to investigate the golden city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001220_KRILE<tab>Eh bien, il souhaite que notre or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion effectue des recherches au sujet de la cité d'or de Tural.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001230_ERENVILLE<tab>A request to investigate the golden city...from the Dawnservant himself?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001230_ERENVILLE<tab>Le roi lui-même demande d'enquêter sur la cité d'or...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, well... Seems it may be more than a rumor after all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mais c'est très intéressant, dis-moi... Reste à voir si c'est vrai.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001250_KRILE<tab>Being a member of the royal family, it was my hope that you could confirm the authenticity of this letter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001250_KRILE<tab>Puisque tu es sa fille, tu devrais pouvoir confirmer que la lettre provient bien de lui, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001260_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can say for a fact that my father didn't write this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001260_WUKLAMAT<tab>Désolée, mais c'est pas son écriture.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Given how culturally diverse Tuliyollal is, it was decided some time ago that a common language was needed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001270_WUKLAMAT<tab>Au Tuliyollal, nous utilisons la langue de Tural. Au départ, la fédération était composée de plein de clans ayant chacun leur langue. Pour faciliter les échanges, mon vieux a instauré un langage officiel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001280_WUKLAMAT<tab>But instead of elevating an existing tongue, and its speakers, above all others, we looked to those widely spoken overseas and created an altogether new one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001280_WUKLAMAT<tab>Enfin, je dis ça, mais il n'a rien inventé. Il s'est simplement inspiré des mots courants utilisés à travers le monde, plutôt que d'imposer un de nos dialectes locaux. Du coup, c'est assez proche de la langue commune d'Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001290_WUKLAMAT<tab>These similarities to your common tongue also make it quite easy to communicate in these situations, no?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001290_WUKLAMAT<tab>Grâce à ça, c'est beaucoup plus facile de se comprendre entre clans.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001300_WUKLAMAT<tab>This letter, however, is entirely in Eorzean. If Father had written this, it would have been in Turali.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001300_WUKLAMAT<tab>S'il avait bien écrit cette lettre, il l'aurait fait dans la langue de Tural... Sauf que tout ce que je viens de lire était en éorzéen.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001310_WUKLAMAT<tab>What's more, it bears a wax seal. We don't bother with them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001310_WUKLAMAT<tab>C'est pareil pour le cachet symbolisant les armoiries royales. Personne n'utilise ça chez nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001320_KRILE<tab>So the letter is fraudulent, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001320_KRILE<tab>Alors, cette lettre serait une contrefaçon...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001330_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, I didn't mean to say that. My father's signature is genuine, as far as I can tell, so perhaps he simply dictated it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001330_WUKLAMAT<tab>Pardon, j'ai pas été assez claire. Il l'a peut-être pas écrite, mais au vu de la signature, je pense qu'elle vient bien de lui. Il a dû la faire rédiger par quelqu'un d'autre, c'est tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001340_KRILE<tab>I see... Thank you for the confirmation. It seems my grandfather indeed had dealings with Tuliyollal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001340_KRILE<tab>Oui, tu as sûrement raison... Merci. Mon grand-père a donc bel et bien eu des échanges avec le royaume du Tuliyollal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001350_KRILE<tab>I can't help but be curious as to what exactly he was doing there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001350_KRILE<tab>Pour être honnête, je suis curieuse d'en apprendre davantage sur ses activités là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001360_KRILE<tab>In order to help us decide on a course of action, would you mind if I asked you some questions about your home?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001360_KRILE<tab>Pourrais-tu nous en dire plus au sujet de ton pays<var 1D /var>? Cela nous permettrait de mieux nous préparer pour la suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001370_WUKLAMAT<tab>By all means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001370_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bien sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001380_WUKLAMAT<tab>After all, learning about one another was the purpose of this hunt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001380_WUKLAMAT<tab>De toute façon, c'était ce que je comptais faire depuis le début. C'est bien pour ça que j'ai proposé cette petite partie de chasse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001390_WUKLAMAT<tab>We can talk while feasting on this fellow. I for one am starving!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001390_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mais avant ça, c'est l'heure de se remplir la panse<var 1D /var>! Une bonne histoire, ça se raconte autour d'un bon gueuleton<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001400_GRAHATIA<tab>We're eating...that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001400_GRAHATIA<tab>On va vraiment manger ce trrruc...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001410_WUKLAMAT<tab>Come, come, let's enjoy the bounty of our first outing together!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001410_WUKLAMAT<tab>Les amis, on va se régaler<var 1D /var>! J'ai hâte de goûter à notre première prise<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001415_WUKLAMAT<tab>ハムッ……！
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001415_WUKLAMAT<tab>ハムッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001420_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'd heard that Sharlayan cuisine was terrible, but this is fantastic!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001420_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mmmh, trop bon<var 1D /var>! Mon frère m'avait dit que la bouffe de Sharlayan était infecte, mais c'est pas si mal, en fait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001430_ERENVILLE<tab>What is this? It smells...spicy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001430_ERENVILLE<tab>Ouh...<var 1D /var>! Ça me pique le nez... C'est beaucoup trop épicé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh come now, since when did you become so soft? It's not like we don't have spicy food in Tural too!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001440_WUKLAMAT<tab>Bah alors, tu t'es ramolli avec le temps, ou quoi<var 1D /var>? La bouffe chez nous a toujours été corsée, à ce que je sache<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001450_GRAHATIA<tab>According to Dickon, intensely hot dishes have become popular in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han after a traveler ordered a curry with several times the usual amount of spice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001450_GRAHATIA<tab>Dickon m'a raconté tout à l'heure qu'à Radz-at-Han, la nourriture trrrès épicée était devenue populaire grâce à une certaine jeune femme friande de plats relevés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001460_GRAHATIA<tab>So he started offering the same in order to please the growing Hannish population here in Sharlayan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001460_GRAHATIA<tab>Et comme de nos jours, de plus en plus de Hannois viennent travailler à Sharlayan, il a adapté ses propres recettes pour leur faire plaisirrr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001470_WUKLAMAT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001470_WUKLAMAT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001480_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's nothing...I can't handle!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001480_WUKLAMAT<tab>C-c'est rien ça, rien du tout... J'ai déjà mangé dix fois plus pimenté que ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001490_ERENVILLE<tab>Your boorish manners reflect poorly on the both of us. I wish you would consider your station...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001490_ERENVILLE<tab>Dis donc, ça te dirait de te comporter véritablement en princesse, pour une fois<var 1D /var>? Je n'ai pas envie qu'on me tienne responsable de tes mauvaises manières.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001500_WUKLAMAT<tab>I swear, sometimes it feels like you open your mouth only to criticize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001500_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh ça va, fous-moi la paix<var 1D /var>! Faut toujours que tu l'ouvres pour te plaindre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001510_GRAHATIA<tab>Would I be correct in assuming you've known each other for a long time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001510_GRAHATIA<tab>Vous avez l'airrr de bien vous connaître. Vous vous côtoyez depuis longtemps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Aye. Thick as thieves since we were little.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001520_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ouais, on est copains d'enfance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001530_ERENVILLE<tab>I beg to differ. She is a long-standing acquaintance, nothing more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001530_ERENVILLE<tab>Pas vraiment, non. C'est juste une vieille con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, rien de plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001535_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001535_GRAHATIA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001540_GRAHATIA<tab>I see, I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001540_GRAHATIA<tab>En effet. Je comprrrends mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001550_KRILE<tab>All this time, you were from Tural? Would that I had known sooner. There's so much I'd like to ask...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001550_KRILE<tab>Mais alors, vous êtes aussi originaire du continent de Tural, Erenville<var 1D /var>? Si j'avais su, j'en aurais profité pour vous poser mille et une questions...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001560_ERENVILLE<tab>You and everyone else. I've kept it quiet so as to avoid the endless interrogations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001560_ERENVILLE<tab>Non merci... C'est justement pour éviter ce genre de désagrément que je n'en parle pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001570_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, if he's going to be a miser, I'll be happy to tell you about our homeland instead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001570_WUKLAMAT<tab>Eh bien, puisque môssieur Erenville est trop prétentieux pour parler de son pays natal, je vais m'en charger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001580_WUKLAMAT<tab>Since ancient times, many peoples have called Tural home, and they've been fighting each other for nearly as long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001580_WUKLAMAT<tab>Pour commencer, de nombreuses tribus coexistent au Tural. Pas seulement des Mamool Ja, mais aussi des gens comme Erenville ou moi. En fait, ces clans ont été en guerre pendant très longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001590_WUKLAMAT<tab>The fighting finally stopped some eighty years ago, when the reigning Dawnservant unified the disparate communities and founded a new nation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001590_WUKLAMAT<tab>Jusqu'à il y a environ quatre-vingts ans, quand Gulool Ja Ja, notre roi actuel, est parvenu à tous les unifier sous une même bannière et à leur apporter la prospérité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001600_GRAHATIA<tab>And that's how Tuliyollal came to be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001600_GRAHATIA<tab>C'est ainsi que s'est forrrmé le royaume fédéré du Tuliyollal, je présume.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001610_WUKLAMAT<tab>Since then, we've enjoyed an era of uninterrupted peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001610_WUKLAMAT<tab>Nous avons alors connu une période de paix absolue pendant plusieurs décennies.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001620_WUKLAMAT<tab>But my father is getting old, and he wishes to relinquish the throne to a worthy successor─one who can preserve his legacy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001620_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mais au bout d'autant d'années, même le plus grand des souverains finit par devenir un simple vieillard. C'est pour lui trouver un héritier que nous organisons le rite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001630_WUKLAMAT<tab>Including myself, there are four claimants to the throne. But while we all have the right to participate, one among us cannot be allowed to rule.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001630_WUKLAMAT<tab>Actuellement, il y a quatre prétendants à la succession, moi incluse. Et même si nous avons tous obtenu le droit de participer au rite, vaudrait mieux que certains d'entre eux ne montent jamais sur le trône.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001640_ERENVILLE<tab>A man who is too ambitious by half.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001640_ERENVILLE<tab>... Disons que l'un des candidats affiche des ambitions qui s'étendent au-delà du continent de Tural.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001650_ERENVILLE<tab>Word of the Garlean Empire's collapse has reached Tural.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001650_ERENVILLE<tab>La nouvelle de la chute de Garlemald s'est répandue par-delà l'océan pour parvenir jusque là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001660_ERENVILLE<tab>While most are simply relieved, he sees weakness to exploit, and would lead our armies across the seas on a campaign of conquest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001660_ERENVILLE<tab>Forcément, cet individu s'est dit que c'était l'occasion rêvée d'agrandir son territoire... et que le moment était venu de partir à la conquête du vieux continent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001670_WUKLAMAT<tab>After everything my father has done to give us peace, he would drag us back into war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001670_WUKLAMAT<tab>Si notre roi est parvenu à unifier tous les clans et à instaurer une paix durable, c'est pas pour que son successeur foute tout en l'air en jouant les va-t-en-guerre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001680_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can't allow it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001680_WUKLAMAT<tab>Personne n'a envie de ça chez nous, et cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment pas moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001690_WUKLAMAT<tab>No matter what, I must win this contest!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001690_WUKLAMAT<tab>Voilà pourquoi je dois à tout prix remporter la victoire lors du rite. Je ferai tout pour préserver la paix instaurée par mon paternel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001700_GRAHATIA<tab>I understand your reasons, but this being an event that will dictate the course of your nation's future, is it appropriate for outsiders like us to be involved?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001700_GRAHATIA<tab>Effectivement, la situation est grrrave... Mais ça ne risque pas de poser problème si des étrangers comme nous se mêlent à un événement aussi important<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001710_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, it's more than appropriate. The Dawnservant himself expressly encourages it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001710_WUKLAMAT<tab>De ce côté, y a pas à s'en faire. Ce qu'on attend de notre roi, c'est pas qu'il vienne d'une lignée noble, mais qu'il soit capable de diriger et de fédérer les nombreuses tribus de Tural.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001720_WUKLAMAT<tab>The ruler of Tural must navigate the intricacies of myriad cultures, and there's no better way to prove oneself qualified to do so than to work with foreign allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001720_WUKLAMAT<tab>Les prétendants au trône sont donc autorisés à faire appel à qui ils veulent pour les épauler, étrangers ou non... D'ailleurs, c'est même vivement conseillé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001730_WUKLAMAT<tab>That's why I sought you out. Through our hunt, I've confirmed that you're a warrior of considerable skill. But more importantly, one of good character as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001730_WUKLAMAT<tab>C'est pour ça que je voulais absolument te rencontrer. Erenville m'avait déjà vendu du rêve en me racontant tes exploits, mais maintenant que j'ai pu te voir à l'œuvre grâce à notre petite chasse, je sais que t'es digne de confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001740_WUKLAMAT<tab>And so I ask you: will you lend me your strength, and help me win the throne of Tuliyollal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001740_WUKLAMAT<tab>Permets-moi de te le dire à nouveau<var 1D /var>: j'ai besoin de toi pour monter sur le trône du Tuliyollal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001750_WUKLAMAT<tab>You don't need to decide right this moment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001750_WUKLAMAT<tab>... Rassure-toi, t'es pas obligé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de me répondre tout de suite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001760_WUKLAMAT<tab>But I will need you if I'm to triumph over the competition. I'll stay here as long as I can while waiting for your answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001760_WUKLAMAT<tab>Mais sache seulement que je pourrai pas gagner sans ton aide. J'attendrai le temps qu'il faudra... Tant qu'on arrive avant le début du rite, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001770_KRILE<tab>In that case, allow us to prepare a room for you at the Baldesion Annex.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001770_KRILE<tab>Dans ce cas, je demanderai à ce qu'on te prépare une chambre à l'annexe des Élèves de Baldesion. Tu pourras t'y installer le temps de ton séjour ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001780_WUKLAMAT<tab>That's very kind of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001780_WUKLAMAT<tab>Eh ben, puisque c'est proposé si gentiment, je vais pas me priver<var 1D /var>! Merci, ma belle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001790_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, and one more thing... Once we've finished eating, would you mind if I took the rest of the meat?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001790_WUKLAMAT<tab>Dites, ça vous dérange si j'embarque ce qui reste de bidoche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001800_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, it's just... Despite all that we've learned, I can't help but feel we've yet to hear the whole story...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001800_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, rrrien... Je me disais juste que c'était bien joli, toutes ces recherches sur Tural, mais qu'on oubliait le plus important.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001810_GRAHATIA<tab>What about you, my friend? Are you inclined to accept or refuse Wuk Lamat's request?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001810_GRAHATIA<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu as l'intention de fairrre, toi<var 1D /var>? Tu vas accepter la demande de Wuk Lamat<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I never say no to a new adventure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tant qu'il y a de l'aventure à la clef, ça me va<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm still undecided, to be honest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Honnêtement, je ne sais pas trop...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'd rather not get involved in politics.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Mettre mon nez dans des conflits royaux<var 1D /var>? Non merci.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Hah, I thought you might say that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001820_GRAHATIA<tab>Hé hé, ça ne m'étonne pas de toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001830_GRAHATIA<tab>With an intrepid attitude such as yours, I believe all shall be well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001830_GRAHATIA<tab>Si c'est ce que tu penses, je n'ai rien à redirrre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001840_GRAHATIA<tab>Be it the contest or something else, there will be many trials for you to overcome at your destination.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001840_GRAHATIA<tab>Certes, tu risques d'avoir ton lot de problèmes à gérrrer, entre ta par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>tion au rite et la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té qu'elle implique...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001850_GRAHATIA<tab>But in the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you'll surely find a way forward. That's what adventurers do, is it not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001850_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais ce voyage, c'est surtout l'occasion de découvrir de nouveaux horizons, de faire de nouvelles rencontres... Et tu pourras toujours juger de ce qui est bon ou pas pour toi en cours de route. C'est ça l'aventurrre, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001860_GRAHATIA<tab>I don't blame you. No matter the assurances, it's no simple thing to wade into the midst of a political struggle, and in a foreign land at that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001860_GRAHATIA<tab>Rien de plus norrrmal... Après tout, ce ne sera pas un voyage facile, et il n'est pas évident de savoir si s'impliquer dans cette histoire de rite est vraiment une bonne chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001870_GRAHATIA<tab>How about this, then. Instead of deciding here, go there first and then decide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001870_GRAHATIA<tab>Mais peut-êtrrre que ça vaut quand même le coup d'essayer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001880_GRAHATIA<tab>In the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you'll surely find a way forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001880_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu pourras découvrir de nouveaux horizons, faire de nouvelles rencontrrres... et au milieu de tout ça, trouver ta propre voie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>That's what adventurers do, is it not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001890_GRAHATIA<tab>Au fond, c'est un peu ça, partir à l'aventurrre, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001900_GRAHATIA<tab>If only others had the same good sense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001900_GRAHATIA<tab>Ha ha... Je vois trrrès bien ce que tu veux dire. Je ne devrais pas en rire, mais bon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001910_GRAHATIA<tab>If the prospect troubles you so, why not consider what you stand to gain instead? That is, an exciting journey to a faraway continent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001910_GRAHATIA<tab>Peut-êtrrre que tu devrais voir les choses d'une autre façon<var 1D /var>? Rien ne t'empêche de profiter du voyage à ta manière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001920_GRAHATIA<tab>In the course of seeing new lands and meeting new people, you might find yourself moved to help Wuk Lamat after all. And if not, well...you quietly take your leave.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001920_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu pourras découvrir de nouveaux horizons, faire de nouvelles rencontres... Tu auras toujours le temps de décider si tu veux continuer d'aider Wuk Lamat ou non. Et au pirrre, tu trouveras bien un moyen de lui fausser compagnie en toute discrétion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001930_GRAHATIA<tab>A brazen plan, perhaps, but one that befits a veteran adventurer, you must agree!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001930_GRAHATIA<tab>Qu'en dis-tu<var 1D /var>? C'est une façon un peu égoïste d'agir, mais je suis sûrrr que ça conviendra à l'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> roublard<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> que tu es<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001940_GRAHATIA<tab>Such a journey would be the envy of many a scholar. Distant as it is, Tural remains largely unknown to us, with only meager records to be found in Noumenon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001940_GRAHATIA<tab>Une contrée inconnue, mentionnée sporrradiquement dans nos livres... Pour nous, le Tuliyollal représente le bout du monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>The experiences to be had─all the things you might hear, feel, and think... It's enough to stir me to the core.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001950_GRAHATIA<tab>Honnêtement, je peine à imaginer ce que tu vas y voir, y entendre, y apprendre... Et malgrrré ça, je suis tout excité rien que d'y penser<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001960_GRAHATIA<tab>Life is a series of journeys, my friend, and there's no telling what awaits us on the long road.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001960_GRAHATIA<tab>Reprendre sans cesse sa route, jour après jour... C'était la réponse de l'humanité face à l'apocalypse. Et toi, que finiras-tu par trouver, au terrrme de ton périple...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001970_GRAHATIA<tab>But what's important is to be true to yourself as you walk it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001970_GRAHATIA<tab>Pourrr le moment, tu n'as qu'à aller là où tes pas te mènent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001980_GRAHATIA<tab>Only then can we hope to be content when we arrive at the end of one─and step forward into another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001980_GRAHATIA<tab>Après tout, la fin d'un voyage est le début d'un autrrre. Un nouveau monde te tend les bras. Ton chemin n'a aucune raison de s'arrêter ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001990_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, but there's an idea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_001990_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, je sais...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002000_GRAHATIA<tab>I have a matter to attend to at the Agora. Please go on inside─I will join you shortly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002000_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vais faire un détour par l'Agora avant de rentrer à l'annexe des Élèves de Baldesion. On s'y retrouve tout à l'heurrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002010_WUKLAMAT<tab>You have the look of someone who's made up their mind. Go on then, let's hear it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002010_WUKLAMAT<tab>À voir ta tête... t'as pris ta décision, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Vas-y, balance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I wish to boldly go where I've never gone before!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il est temps que mes pas me guident vers de nouveaux horizons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've never been one to turn down an adventure. I'll do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'accepte ta proposition. Je suis <var 08 E905 ((une aventurière)) ((un aventurier)) /var>, après tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002020_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002020_WUKLAMAT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002030_WUKLAMAT<tab>Then you need me as much as I need you. Together, we'll blaze new trails in Tural!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002030_WUKLAMAT<tab>Alors ma proposition tombe à pic. Tu vas pouvoir découvrir les recoins de Tural que personne n'a jamais explorés<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002040_WUKLAMAT<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002040_WUKLAMAT<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002050_WUKLAMAT<tab>Excellent! You'll be compensated for your troubles, of course, but I daresay your time in Tural will be its own reward!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002050_WUKLAMAT<tab>Merci, je te revaudrai ça. Je peux rien t'offrir pour le moment, si ce n'est ta première grande aventure au Tural<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002060_ALISAIE<tab>You're not planning to leave without us, are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002060_ALISAIE<tab>Bah et nous, alors<var 1D /var>? On nous oublie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002070_KRILE<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie! What are you two doing here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002070_KRILE<tab>Alisaie, Alphinaud<var 1D /var>! Quel bon vent vous amène ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002080_GRAHATIA<tab>We happened to cross paths at Noumenon earlier, you see, and I told them about Wuk Lamat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002080_GRAHATIA<tab>On s'était crrroisés il y a peu devant le Noumène, et j'en avais profité pour leur parler de Wuk Lamat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002090_GRAHATIA<tab>And when we fortuitously met again at the Agora just now, they expressed an interest in meeting our visitor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002090_GRAHATIA<tab>Et là, je viens de tomber à nouveau sur eux alors que je faisais des emplettes à l'Agora. Ils m'ont demandé s'ils pouvaient la rrrencontrer, donc... voilà.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002100_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ah, you must be the twins who were sneaking after Erenville as toads!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002100_WUKLAMAT<tab>Aaaah<var 1D /var>! C'est pas vous, les jumeaux qui se sont transformés en crapauds pour prendre Erenville en filature<var 1D /var>? Il m'a parlé de vous deux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002110_ALISAIE<tab>A hundred things about us you could have told her, and you chose that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002110_ALISAIE<tab>Dis donc<var 1D /var>! T'avais pas mieux à lui raconter à notre sujet<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002120_ERENVILLE<tab>First impressions last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002120_ERENVILLE<tab>Et alors<var 1D /var>? C'est la vérité, il me semble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis an honor and a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Your Highness. Alphinaud Leveilleur, at your service, and this is my sister, Alisaie.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002130_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mon nom est Alphinaud, et voici ma sœur Alisaie. C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer, Votre Altesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002140_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh, no, let's not do that. I really can't stand titles.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002140_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh là, mon gars. Tu peux laisser tomber le bla bla cérémonial, j'ai horreur de ça.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002150_WUKLAMAT<tab>So. You want to participate in the contest too, is that right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002150_WUKLAMAT<tab>Dis-moi plutôt... Si je comprends bien, vous voulez aussi participer au rite, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed we do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eh bien, puisque vous me le permettez...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've been assisting with the rebuilding effort in Garlemald. Yet while progress is being made, the question remains of how the nation might reconcile with its neighbors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous essayons ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment d'aider les Garlemaldais à rebâtir leur pays. Dans l'immédiat, nous devons les amener à trouver un terrain d'entente avec les ressortissants étrangers et les différentes peuplades venus offrir leur solidarité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>We believe there is much we might learn from Tuliyollal, a nation founded on unity. And in return for this honor, we would spare no effort in supporting your claim.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est là que nous nous sommes dit, avec ma sœur, qu'il serait intéressant d'étudier comment le Tuliyollal est parvenu à fédérer autant d'ethnies différentes. Bien sûr, nous ferons aussi tout notre possible pour vous soutenir lors du rite de succession.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002190_WUKLAMAT<tab>The more the merrier, I say. And I'd be keen to learn about Eorzea and Garlemald from you as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002190_WUKLAMAT<tab>Ça me va. Plus on est de fous, plus on rit<var 1D /var>! Et comme ça, vous pourrez m'apprendre des tas de choses sur Éorzéa et Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002200_ERENVILLE<tab>Having recruited so many committed and capable allies, I presume you have no need for my continued assistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002200_ERENVILLE<tab>Eh bien, te voilà entourée d'une fine équipe. Je suppose que tu n'as plus vraiment besoin de mon aide, du coup<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Nonsense! Like I told you before, you're indispensable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002210_WUKLAMAT<tab>Tu rigoles ou quoi<var 1D /var>? Tu crois que je vais te laisser te débiner aussi facilement<var 1D /var>? T'as promis de m'accompagner pendant tout le rite, je te rappelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002220_WUKLAMAT<tab>They're strong, aye, but strangers to our land. They need someone to guide them─to point out the dangers and spare them grisly deaths.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002220_WUKLAMAT<tab>Je les ai vus à l'œuvre, je sais qu'ils se débrouilleront comme des chefs face aux bêtes les plus féroces. Ça n'empêche qu'ils vont débarquer en territoire inconnu, et qu'il va falloir quelqu'un pour les guider et les mettre en garde sur les nombreux dangers du coin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002230_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can't think of anyone better suited to that task than you. What's more, despite your assertions, I know you haven't given up on the city of gold.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002230_WUKLAMAT<tab>Il me semble que c'est ton boulot, non<var 1D /var>? Et puis... tu vas pas me dire que les rumeurs autour de la cité d'or ne t'intéressent pas un tout petit peu<var 1D /var>? Mmmm<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002240_GRAHATIA<tab>As I recall, Krile, you were the first to state your desire to visit Tural.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002240_GRAHATIA<tab>Krile, tu y vas aussi, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Tu as été la première à nous dire que tu voulais suivre les traces de ton grand-pèrrre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002250_KRILE<tab>Perhaps I was...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002250_KRILE<tab>Oui... C'est vrai, mais...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002260_KRILE<tab>Still, I can't help but worry about being away just when our order is beginning to find its feet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002260_KRILE<tab>En réalité, je ne suis pas sûre que ce soit une bonne chose de m'éloigner des Élèves de Baldesion, maintenant que l'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion est à nouveau sur les rails...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002270_GRAHATIA<tab>You have nothing to worry about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002270_GRAHATIA<tab>Si ce n'est que ça, tu n'as pas à t'en inquiéter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>I haven't forgotten how you held the fort while I set off to explore Alzadaal's Legacy; it's only fair that I return the favor. Pray leave the Students to Ojika and me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002280_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu m'as déjà laissé ta place lors de l'exploration des ruines sous-marines. Cette fois, c'est à mon tourrr. Ojika et moi, on s'occupera de l'or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion en ton absence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002290_KRILE<tab>But Raha...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002290_KRILE<tab>C'est gentil, Raha, mais tu ne voulais pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>You want to retrace your grandfather's steps, don't you? This is a rare opportunity, and I insist that you seize it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002300_GRAHATIA<tab>Ne t'en fais pas pourrr moi. Tu tiens enfin l'occasion d'en savoir plus sur ton grand-père, alors ne la rate pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002310_KRILE<tab>Thank you, Raha. Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002310_KRILE<tab>Oui, tu as raison...<var 1D /var>! Merci, Raha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002320_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, looks like it's settled! I'm counting on you all to help me win the throne!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002320_WUKLAMAT<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Tant d'enthousiasme, ça fait plaisir à voir<var 1D /var>! Avec vous tous à mes côtés, les autres prétendants au trône n'ont qu'à bien se tenir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>I suppose now is a good time to show you what I spent a small fortune on at the Agora.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002330_GRAHATIA<tab>Alors il est temps que je vous montre mon arme secrrrète. Toutes mes économies y sont passées, mais je suis sûr qu'elle vous sera utile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>There!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002340_GRAHATIA<tab>Et voilà le trrravail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002350_GRAHATIA<tab>This, my friends, is the latest map of the world, created to celebrate our friendship with the Loporrits. Cast your eyes west of Sharlayan, for there it lies...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002350_GRAHATIA<tab>Nos cartographes ont pu établir une nouvelle mappemonde grâce à l'aide des Loporrites. Regarrrdez donc à l'ouest, depuis Sharlayan...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002355_GRAHATIA<tab>The site of your next great adventure─Tural!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002355_GRAHATIA<tab>Je vous présente votre prrrochaine destination... le continent de Tural<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002360_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Limsa Lominsa...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002360_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, à Limsa Lominsa

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002370_ESTINIEN<tab>When does the next ship set sail?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002370_ESTINIEN<tab>Quand part le prochain navire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002380_RHETKYMPF<tab>May I ask your destination?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002380_RHETKYMPF<tab>Euh... Ce serait pour quelle destination, Monsieur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002390_ESTINIEN<tab>The north and east, I've already seen...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002390_ESTINIEN<tab>Je suis déjà allé au nord et à l'est... Par conséquent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002400_ESTINIEN<tab>I suppose I'll head west this time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002400_ESTINIEN<tab>Cette fois, ce sera à l'ouest.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002410_RHETKYMPF<tab>“West,” you say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002410_RHETKYMPF<tab>“L'ouest”<var 1D /var>? Euh, c'est-à-dire...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002420_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Old Sharlayan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002420_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Plus tard, à Sharlayan

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002430_THANCRED<tab>I see you've made up your mind. I had a feeling you'd be keen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002430_THANCRED<tab>Ça y est, je crois qu'ils se sont décidés à partir. Comme prévu, j'ai envie de dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002440_URIANGER<tab>But to think that our comrades, too, are thither bound... Fate doth work in mysterious ways.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002440_URIANGER<tab>Ainsi, notre ami compte aussi se rendre là-bas<var 1D /var>? Décidément, le destin nous réserve bien des surprises...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002450_URIANGER<tab>But to think that our comrades, too, are thither bound... Fate doth work in mysterious ways.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002450_URIANGER<tab>Ainsi, notre amie compte aussi se rendre là-bas<var 1D /var>? Décidément, le destin nous réserve bien des surprises...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002460_THANCRED<tab>Indeed. It will be a grueling task, having to contend with them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002460_THANCRED<tab>Tu m'ôtes les mots de la bouche. On ne fera pas long feu si on doit les affronter...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002470_URIANGER<tab>If the prospect doth trouble thee, 'tis not too late to decline the petition.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002470_URIANGER<tab>Dans ce cas, peut-être n'est-il pas trop tard pour décliner cette requête<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002480_URIANGER<tab>...Though thine expression would suggest thou art far from perturbed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002480_URIANGER<tab>... Enfin, vous n'avez pas l'air véritablement inquiet, de ce que je peux observer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002490_THANCRED<tab>Oh, how could I possibly be, knowing what's to come?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002490_THANCRED<tab>Oh que non. Hors de question de rater une occasion pareille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002495_URIANGER<tab>Hmph. (REPORT IF DISPLAYED)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002495_URIANGER<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002500_URIANGER<tab>Then let us delay no further, and secure passage on a vessel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002500_URIANGER<tab>Alors il ne nous reste plus qu'à nous mettre en quête d'un navire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002510_THANCRED<tab>Aye, this will be a mission to remember.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002510_THANCRED<tab>Bon, on va avoir du pain sur la planche, nous aussi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002520_THANCRED<tab>Come, my friend! We make for Tural!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002520_THANCRED<tab>Allez... En route pour Tural<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002530_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Tell me, have you been to the ruins beneath the waters of the Bounty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002530_EMETSELCH<tab>As-tu déjà exploré les ruines qui dorment au fin fond de la mer de l'Abondance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002540_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)Or the treasure islands beyond the frozen waters of Blindfrost, in Othard's north?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002540_EMETSELCH<tab>As-tu déjà voyagé au nord d'Othard<var 1D /var>? Où la vue des côtes de l'île au trésor ne s'offre qu'aux intrépides assez fous pour franchir la mer gelée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002550_EMETSELCH<tab>(-Emet-Selch-)The fabled golden cities of the New World?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06505_002550_EMETSELCH<tab>As-tu déjà contemplé l'éclat des cités d'or du nouveau continent<var 1D /var>?
